title: What websites offer free courses and free certificates? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of the MOOCs have moved to some version of paid courses, yet most of them you can still access some free courses. Coursera - they have moved to mainly a free trial → paidedX - they still have free courses, but you have to pay for a certificateUdacity - they still have some free courses, but have mainly moved to paid coursesAt Free Online Courses - Advance your Career you can search through an aggregated course catalog, and you filter by free courses and also see if they offer a certificate or not. Hope this helps some!Kevin
